import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import './tourscard.css' const ToursCard = ({ tour }) => { const { id ,title, city, photo, price, avgRating } = tour; //featured,reviews return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}
{title}
${price} /per person
); }; export default ToursCard;
